title: Did Trump add 11.6 million jobs to the American economy during the period of the epidemic?
subtitle: U.S. Vice President Mike Pines filed the claim during a debate with a Democratic competitor, Sin Kamala Harris.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: Because of the work of President Donald Trump, the American economy added 11.6 million jobs in summer and autumn 2020 - the recovery of nearly half of the jobs lost at the beginning of the COVID-19 epidemic.
